pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust and Sparse Methods for High Dimensional Linear and Logistic Regression // Fully robust versions of the elastic net estimator are introduced for linear and logistic regression, in particular high dimensional data by Kurnaz, Hoffmann and Filzmoser (2017) DOI:10.1016/j.chemolab.2017.11.017. The algorithm searches for outlier free subsets on which the classical elastic net estimators can be applied.
